      • createClan

        public void createClan()
        Creates the create clan interface. Function should only be accessed if user not a member of a clan. The interface contains a text field to enter the clan name and a button to progress to the next screen.

      • createInterface

        public void createInterface()
        Creates and adds the main clan interface to the clan window. Should only be accessed if a user has a associated clan or has created a clan. Interface has 4 main elements. The clan name and clan emblem appears in the top left of the screen. A group of control buttons appear on the top right. Navigation buttons appear underneath the clan emblem and the main content appears in the bottom right.

      • setClan

        public void setClan(java.lang.String clan)
        Sets the clan name property of the current clan menu
        Parameters:
        clan - The clan name to be set
